question: Hajj Tamattu
answer:
QUESTION
A few years ago, I performed Hajj. After completing Umrah, I performed another Umrah. I am told that it is not permissible to perform an additional Umrah while making Tamattu Hajj as this invalidates the Tamattu Hajj. Is this true?
ANSWER


Share:
If a person performs Umrah of Tamattu and thereafter performs another Umrah before performing Hajj, his Tamattu Hajj will be valid. (Muallimul Hujjaaj pg.256; Idaaratul Qur?aan)
